snippet: The authorities have added terrorism charges against Eric Frein, the man accused of ambushing a state police barracks and killing Cpl. Bryon Dickson.
abstract: Pennsylvania authorities add terrorism charges against Eric Frein, man accused of ambushing a state police barracks and killing Cpl Bryon Dickson.
lead_paragraph: The authorities have added terrorism charges against Eric Frein, the man accused of ambushing a state police barracks and killing Cpl. Bryon Dickson.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Eric Frein Charged With Terrorism
